title: Star Guardian Varsity Jacket Question ,_ ,
body:
I mean, I dunno if there's already a discussion on this, but I was just wondering how long the SG Jacket would be available to buy? Is it just there until they run out, or will they stop selling it in the next week or something? Just curious is all, FeelsBadMan (Also I have no idea what board to put this on)


 {{champion:163}} Shurima is my city

replies.body: I don't recommend buying it if you arent 5'4 and anorexic, I bought one in the biggest size and trust me their 2X is NOT unisex. I sent in a ticket begging for any chance I had at getting one in a realistic size but haven't heard yet. (They deleted my ticket) When I tried it again and the same thing happened I asked why they do that and they denied it ever even existing...
Ibdont know but I got one for me and my bf ♡♡ it will be the matching jackets I always wanted ♡♡♡ I hope they fit
Cool cool, I hope they'd fit as well XD

I'm not part of the merch team so I can't really say for sure, but probably until sold out.  You can also hit up our merchandise team directly through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well if you have any questions or concerns about orders.
Thank you, I'm just curious to know if I have time to wait for my next paycheck, I figure this coat will suit me better than having food for the rest of this week
